subject: Item shared with you: "Desktop 2025.09.19 - 22.02.29.01.mp4"
description_text:
I've shared an item with you:

Desktop 2025.09.19 - 22.02.29.01.mp4
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eQLrInyEPJAlSHX0dUcTA2-GJo8tLtiq/view?usp=sharing&invite=CK7P6KgD&ts=68ce0fc3

It's not an attachment -- it's stored online. To open this item, just click  
the link above.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eQLrInyEPJAlSHX0dUcTA2-GJo8tLtiq/view?usp=drive_link

Hello, I deleted 2.1.0 and downloaded 2.1.1, and I still have the same  
problem (there is no reset button, but I removed the USB cable and put it  
back in. It is already in the blue USB port. I have already disabled all  
firewalls on the PC. When I open the app, it appears like this in the  
video. I can't click on it in the software and it tells me to remove the  
USB and put it back in. It stays on Simsonn Flasher and nothing happens!  
There must be a way. I haven't been able to use it for 3 days.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4436 中
